content: I think this should be true (without any assumptions on the ring), and I should have used it several times. But I can't remember how to prove it. I think it's also true for Module.rank >= n as long as n is not a limit cardinal.

#9626
I'll try to merge it now...
It does not contain the cardinal version though. Do you need that? (should be the same proof)

Andrew Yang said:

It does not contain the cardinal version though. Do you need that? (should be the same proof)

Not yet. I only need the natural number version.
Maybe you can leave it as a future PR (if anyone needs to use it).
Jz Pan has marked this topic as resolved.
